messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: 7th Cav and swords-----Garryowens?
messages.msgSnippet: How unusual that two of my ancestors,  Martin Brennan and John Ryan, both served in the Seventh under Custer,  and I have a painting of mine in the Armory of
messages.messageBody:
How unusual that two of my ancestors, Martin Brennan and John Ryan, both
served in the Seventh under Custer, and I have a painting of mine in the Armory
of the other Garryowens, New York's Fighting 69th. The Navahos do not
believe in coincidences. "Garryowen Jack" Murphy; the nickname being given me
this year by the 69th's historian Sgt. Vic Olney.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
